file.name: openapi-definition.yml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Open Brew API
  description: This is the common standard api description for the exchange of beer brewing recipes. Cheers.
  license:
    name: Beerware
    url: https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beerware
servers:
  - url: http://api.openbrewhub.com/api/
paths:
  /recipes:
    get:
      summary: List all receipes
      operationId: listRecipes
      tags:
        - recipes
      parameters:
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: How many brew recipes to return at one time (max/default 100)
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
        - name: offset
          in: query
          description: Offset number for enabling pagination
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
        - name: searchQuery
          in: query
          description: Search phrase for recipes
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A paged array of brew recipes
          headers:
            x-next:
              description: A link to the next page of responses
              schema:
                type: string
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Recipes"
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    post:
      summary: Create a new recipe
      operationId: createRecipe
      tags:
        - recipes
      requestBody:
        description: Add your favourite recipe
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Recipe"
      responses:
        "201":
          description: Null response
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"

  /recipes/{recipeId}:
    get:
      summary: Get a specific recipe
      operationId: getRecipe
      tags:
        - recipes
      parameters:
        - name: recipeId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The id of the recipe to retrieve
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Expected response to a valid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Recipe"
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    put:
      summary: Replace/update an existing recipe
      operationId: updateRecipe
      tags:
        - recipes
      parameters:
        - name: recipeId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The id of the recipe to replace/update
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        description: Add your favourite recipe
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Recipe"
      responses:
        "201":
          description: Null response
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    delete:
      summary: Delete an existing recipe
      operationId: deleteRecipe
      tags:
        - recipes
      parameters:
        - name: recipeId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The id of the recipe to delete
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "201":
          description: Null response
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
components:
  schemas:
    Recipe:
      type: object
      properties:
        openBrewVersion:
          description: The version of openbrew in format [0-9].[0-9].[0-9]
          type: string
        encoding:
          description: The used encoding. Default is 'utf-8'
          type: string
        info:
          type: object
          properties:
            recipeName:
              description: The name of your fabulous beer recipe
              type: string
            recipeVersion:
              description:
                The version of your recipe. Value will be increased automatically,
                when you update your recipe
              type: integer
            beerType:
              description: The name of your fabulous beer recipe
              type: string
            source:
              type: string
            createDate:
              type: string
            changeDate:
              type: string
            images:
              type: array
              items:
                type: object
                properties:
                  url:
                    type: string
                  description:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        language:
                          type: string
                        text:
                          type: string
                      required:
                        - language
                        - text
                required:
                  - url
            recipeDescription:
              type: array
              items:
                type: object
                properties:
                  language:
                    type: string
                  text:
                    type: string
                required:
                  - language
                  - text
            author:
              type: object
              properties:
                openBrewHubId:
                  type: integer
                commercialBrewery:
                  type: boolean
                breweryName:
                  type: string
                brewMasterName:
                  type: string
                breweryUrl:
                  type: string
                phone:
                  type: string
                address:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    street:
                      type: string
                    houseNumber:
                      type: string
                    zip:
                      type: string
                    city:
                      type: string
                    federateState:
                      type: string
                    country:
                      type: string
              required:
                - breweryName
          required:
            - recipeName
            - recipeVersion
            - beerType
            - recipeDescription
            - author
        vitalStatistics:
          type: object
          properties:
            expectedEfficiency:
              type: object
              properties:
                amount:
                  type: integer
                relativeUnit:
                  type: string
              required:
                - amount
                - relativeUnit
            expectedOriginalGravity:
              type: object
              properties:
                amount:
                  type: number
                ratioUnit:
                  type: string
              required:
                - amount
                - ratioUnit
            expectedFinalGravity:
              type: object
              properties:
                amount:
                  type: number
                ratioUnit:
                  type: string
              required:
                - amount
                - ratioUnit
            alcoholContent:
              type: object
              properties:
                amount:
                  type: number
                ratioUnit:
                  type: string
              required:
                - amount
                - ratioUnit
            PhValue:
              type: object
              properties:
                amount:
                  type: number
                chemicalUnit:
                  type: string
              required:
                - amount
                - chemicalUnit
            waterAlkalinity:
              type: object
              properties:
                amount:
                  type: number
                chemicalUnit:
                  type: string
              required:
                - amount
                - chemicalUnit
            bitterness:
              type: object
              properties:
                amount:
                  type: integer
                tasteUnit:
                  type: string
              required:
                - amount
                - tasteUnit
            carbonationLevel:
              type: object
              properties:
                amount:
                  type: integer
                ratioUnit:
                  type: string
              required:
                - amount
                - ratioUnit
            color:
              type: object
              properties:
                amount:
                  type: number
                colorUnit:
                  type: string
              required:
                - amount
                - colorUnit
            _comment:
              type: string
          required:
            - expectedEfficiency
            - expectedOriginalGravity
            - alcoholContent
            - bitterness
            - color
        brew:
          type: object
          properties:
            mash:
              type: object
              properties:
                suggestedMashTypeDescription:
                  type: string
                mashWater:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    water:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        amount:
                          type: integer
                        volumeUnit:
                          type: string
                      required:
                        - amount
                        - volumeUnit
                    waterTreatment:
                      type: array
                      items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          type:
                            type: string
                          amount:
                            type: number
                          volumeUnit:
                            type: string
                        required:
                          - type
                          - amount
                          - volumeUnit
                  required:
                    - water
                solids:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      name:
                        type: string
                      type:
                        type: string
                      portion:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          amount:
                            type: number
                          weightUnit:
                            type: string
                        required:
                          - amount
                          - weightUnit
                    required:
                      - name
                      - type
                      - portion
                rests:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      name:
                        type: string
                      withStirring:
                        type: boolean
                      targetTemperature:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          amount:
                            type: integer
                          tempUnit:
                            type: string
                        required:
                          - amount
                          - tempUnit
                      restingTime:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          amount:
                            type: integer
                          timeUnit:
                            type: string
                        required:
                          - amount
                          - timeUnit
                    required:
                      - name
                      - targetTemperature
                      - restingTime
              required:
                - mashWater
                - solids
                - rests
            lauter:
              type: object
              properties:
                withStirring:
                  type: boolean
                restingTime:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    amount:
                      type: integer
                    timeUnit:
                      type: string
                  required:
                    - amount
                    - timeUnit
                spargeWater:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    water:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        amount:
                          type: integer
                        volumeUnit:
                          type: string
                      required:
                        - amount
                        - volumeUnit
                    waterTreatment:
                      type: array
                      items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          type:
                            type: string
                          amount:
                            type: number
                          volumeUnit:
                            type: string
                        required:
                          - type
                          - amount
                          - volumeUnit
                    targetTemperature:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        amount:
                          type: integer
                        tempUnit:
                          type: string
                      required:
                        - amount
                        - tempUnit
                  required:
                    - water
                    - targetTemperature
              required:
                - restingTime
                - spargeWater
            boil:
              type: object
              properties:
                overallBoilTime:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    amount:
                      type: integer
                    timeUnit:
                      type: string
                  required:
                    - amount
                    - timeUnit
                targetTemperature:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    amount:
                      type: integer
                    tempUnit:
                      type: string
                  required:
                    - amount
                    - tempUnit
                hops:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      name:
                        type: string
                      alphaAcid:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          amount:
                            type: number
                          chemicalUnit:
                            type: string
                        required:
                          - amount
                          - chemicalUnit
                      shape:
                        type: string
                      type:
                        type: string
                      use:
                        type: string
                      time:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          amount:
                            type: integer
                          timeUnit:
                            type: string
                        required:
                          - amount
                          - timeUnit
                    required:
                      - name
                      - alphaAcid
                      - type
                      - use
                      - time
              required:
                - overallBoilTime
                - hops
            fermentation:
              type: object
              properties:
                yeast:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    yeastName:
                      type: string
                    yeastType:
                      type: string
                    yeastAmount:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        amount:
                          type: integer
                        weightUnit:
                          type: string
                      required:
                        - amount
                        - weightUnit
                    yeastStarterNeeded:
                      type: boolean
                  required:
                    - yeastName
                    - yeastType
                    - yeastAmount
                targetTemperature:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    amount:
                      type: integer
                    tempUnit:
                      type: string
                  required:
                    - amount
                    - tempUnit
                secondaryFermentation:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    _comment4:
                      type: string
                  required:
                    - _comment4
              required:
                - yeast
                - targetTemperature
            matureProcess:
              type: object
              properties:
                targetTemperature:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    amount:
                      type: number
                    tempUnit:
                      type: string
                  required:
                    - amount
                    - tempUnit
                restingTime:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    amount:
                      type: integer
                    timeUnit:
                      type: string
                  required:
                    - amount
                    - timeUnit
                descriptions:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      language:
                        type: string
                      text:
                        type: string
                    required:
                      - language
                      - text
          required:
            - mash
            - lauter
            - boil
            - fermentation
      required:
        - openBrewVersion
        - encoding
        - info
        - vitalStatistics
        - brew
    Recipes:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Recipe"
    Error:
      type: object
      required:
        - code
        - message
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        message:
          type: string
